class code_SemperKI.serviceManager.ServiceBase¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract base class defining the interface that every service has to implement

abstractmethod checkIfSelectionIsAvailable(processObj) → bool¶

Checks, if the selection of the service is available (material, …)

Initialize the service

abstractmethod updateServiceDetails(existingContent, newContent)¶

Update a service

abstractmethod deleteServiceDetails(existingContent, deletedContent)¶

Delete stuff from a service

abstractmethod isFileRelevantForService(existingContent, fileID: str) → bool¶

Check if a file is relevant for the service

abstractmethod parseServiceDetails(existingContent) → dict¶

Parse the service details for Frontend

abstractmethod serviceReady(existingContent) → tuple[bool, list[str]]¶

Check if a service has been defined completely

abstractmethod cloneServiceDetails(existingContent: dict, newProcess) → dict¶

Clone content of the service

Parameters:

  • existingContent (dict) – What the process currently holds about the service

  • newProcess (Process|ProcessInterface) – The new process as object

Returns:

The copy of the service details

Return type:

dict

abstractmethod calculatePriceForService(process, additionalArguments: dict, transferObject: object) → dict¶

Calculate the price for all content of the service

Parameters:

  • process (ProcessInterface|Process) – The process with all its details

  • additionalArguments (dict) – Various parameters, differs for every service

  • transferObject (object) – Object to transfer data

Returns:

Dictionary with all pricing details

Return type:

dict

abstractmethod getFilteredContractors(processObj) → tuple[dict, object]¶

Get a list of contractors that can do the job

abstractmethod getServiceSpecificContractorDetails(existingDetails: dict, contractor: object) → dict¶

Get the service specific details for a contractor

abstractmethod serviceSpecificTasks(session, processObj, validationResults: dict) → dict | Exception¶

Do service specific tasks

abstractmethod getSearchableDetails(existingContent) → list¶

Get the details for the search index as a string list

Registers a new service class

Parameters:

  • kwargs (Any) – Parameters for service class
